value:
Teatime etiquette is, in a way,
it's own form of chivalry. A bevy of
good manners is no waste here.

Between battles long past, such
moments of peace and quiet as
these were a rarity.

This change of garb has me slightly
more on edge than expected. Yet, I
will endeavor to wear it with pride.

What could be more enjoyable than
sharing a pleasant tea with one's
family?

I wish to ensure my comrades find
ample moments of respite. Therefore,
I shall eagerly fill their waiting teacups!

I am Sigurd of House Chalphy. I
come bearing an invitation to share
tea with $Nf.

I shall put my hospitality to the test.
Please sit back, relax, and allow me
to attend to your every whim.

The art of making tea is astonishingly
complex. The more I delve into the
details, the more fascinated I become.

This failure shall be my life's blood,
for the next tea I brew will be
unparalleled.

Allow me to repay this kindness at
our next tea party. Your cup will have
my unyielding attention.

I am Sigurd of House Chalphy. I
thought it would be apropos to invite
my comrades to a relaxing tea.

Certainly my efforts were not in vain.
Serving tea was well worth it if only
to see my comrades' smiling faces.$k$pIt is for such serene moments as
these that we risk our lives, for what
could be more symbolic of peace?$k$pI may brandish a weapon every day
in search of peace, but I cannot let
that turn my heart cold.$k$pIt is vital that we acknowledge the
value of peace and hold the sharing
of joy to the utmost import.$k$pWhen these conflicts have subsided,
know your cup will overflow with my
appreciation.
You are most welcome.
Let your cares fade.
I hope you like it.
Have a lovely time.
If you'll excuse me...
Though I am yet an amateur, I can certainly do my utmost.
*start* Now, now. This is the time to be on your best behavior.
Ah! Tss! That was hot! I apologize for my clumsiness.
Deirdre also enjoys tea. We often converse over a freshly brewed pot.
It seems that I must strike a balance between comfort and formality, while also maintaining an air of elegance... The art of the tea service is complex.
I hope that one day my family can enjoy a moment of peace together.
If you found respite while sipping tea...nothing could please me more.
But of course.
Here you are.
What would you like?
